data.taskTitle: project notes / monaco editor is autosuggesting code classes but this is not approproiate
project notes / monaco editor is autosuggesting code classes but this is not appropriate
data.approach: Add a prop to MonacoWrapper to disable autocompletion/intellisense, then use it in ProjectNotes. Will set quickSuggestions=false, suggestOnTriggerCharacters=false, wordBasedSuggestions=off, and other suggest-related options to create a plain text editing experience.

data.taskTitle: project notes / monaco editor is autosuggesting code classes but this is not appropriate
summary: Added disableSuggestions prop to MonacoWrapper component
When enabled, disables quickSuggestions, wordBasedSuggestions, parameterHints, inlineSuggest, and other autocomplete features
Updated ProjectNotes to use disableSuggestions={true} for free-form note taking
reviewFocus: Verify autocomplete is disabled in Project Notes

data.taskTitle: project notes / monaco editor is autosuggesting code classes but this is not appropriate
summary: Added disableSuggestions prop to MonacoWrapper - disables autocomplete for notes
Fixed jumpy editor bug: ProjectNotes now only syncs from props on project change
Fixed jumpy editor bug: MonacoWrapper skips external syncs while editor is focused
These changes prevent race conditions between typing and debounced saves
reviewFocus: Test typing in Project Notes - no more jumping or lost characters

summary: Added disableSuggestions prop to MonacoWrapper that disables autocomplete/intellisense
Applied to ProjectNotes and TaskDetailPaneB notes editors
Fixed race condition by tracking editor focus state - external syncs skipped while typing
Fixed ProjectNotes to only sync from props when project changes, preventing debounce overwrites
